backend/main.mo: Main Motoko actor implementing a manga watchlist backend with user profiles, manga entry CRUD operations, pagination, genre management, and access control using authorization and blob storage mixins.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting four implemented features: vertical auto-scroll animation for manga card titles, rainbow gradient for 'Complete' status, repositioned bookmark/notes icons, and invisible status area borders with chapters display.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Comprehensive summaries of all frontend source files including components for authentication, manga management, layout, hooks for backend queries/mutations, and styling configurations.
frontend/docs/PREDEPLOY_LAYOUT_VERIFICAT: Pre-deployment checklist for verifying critical layout components (AppLayout, MangaListPage, AddMangaDialog) across mobile, tablet, and desktop viewports to prevent layout regressions.
frontend/docs/REBASELINE_FROM_LIVE.md: Documentation of rebaseline process performed on February 6, 2026 to align codebase with live deployment after layout corruption in draft versions 44-45, including verification checklist and explicit rules.
frontend/index.css: Empty CSS file (content truncated or not present).
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point with viewport meta tag, page title describing the manga watchlist app, and script tag loading the React application from main.tsx.
frontend/public/service-worker.js: Service worker implementing cache-first strategy for static assets, network-first for API/navigation requests, with install/activate lifecycle handlers and message-based cache clearing functionality.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main app component that handles authentication flow, service worker registration, and conditionally renders login prompt, profile setup dialog, or manga list page based on user state.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginLogout: Button component that toggles between login and logout states, clearing all caches (React Query, IndexedDB, service worker) on logout and handling authentication errors.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Modal dialog that prompts new users to enter their name for profile creation, with no close button to force completion.
frontend/src/components/layout/APP_LAYOU: Comprehensive test checklist for verifying AppLayout component behavior including header collapse/expand, sticky positioning, footer placement, and responsive design across viewports.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppLayout: Layout wrapper component with collapsible sticky header (logo, title, login button), main content area, and footer with attribution link.
frontend/src/components/manga/ADD_MANGA_: Test checklist for Add Manga dialog ensuring proper scrolling, viewport constraints (90vh, 400px max body height), and accessibility across mobile, tablet, and small laptop screens.
frontend/src/components/manga/AddMangaDi: Dialog form for adding new manga entries with fields for title, alternate titles, genres (with custom genre creation), cover images, synopsis, chapters, status, and rating; includes auto-pruning of invalid genres.
frontend/src/components/manga/AutoScroll: Component that automatically scrolls long titles vertically with bottom-to-top animation, pausing on hover and detecting overflow dynamically.
frontend/src/components/manga/CoverHover: A draggable popup component that displays manga cover images with title cycling, positioned persistently using a custom hook. Includes click-outside detection to close and uses cached cover images.
frontend/src/components/manga/CoverImage: Form field component for uploading and managing manga cover images with file upload, progress tracking, and image removal functionality.
frontend/src/components/manga/EditMangaD: Dialog component for editing manga entries with fields for title, genres, cover images, synopsis, and chapter counts. Computes delta updates and handles custom genre creation.
frontend/src/components/manga/EditNotesD: Simple dialog component for editing manga notes with a textarea, save/cancel buttons, and backend connection status checking.
frontend/src/components/manga/FloatingCo: Sticky, collapsible panel that wraps MangaListControls for filtering, searching, and sorting manga entries with expand/collapse functionality.
frontend/src/components/manga/GenreCheck: Displays genres in a 3-column grid with checkboxes, dynamically measuring and aligning row widths for consistent layout.
frontend/src/components/manga/MANGA_LIST: Comprehensive checklist document for verifying MangaListPage layout integrity including row alignment, overflow behavior, loading states, and responsive design across viewports.
Displays a single manga entry card with cover image, title cycling, rating/bookmark/notes/chapter progress controls, and hover popups. Handles mutations for updating manga metadata via backend hooks.
frontend/src/components/manga/MangaListC: Provides filter and sort controls for the manga list including title/synopsis/notes search, genre selection, bookmark/completed filters, sort options, and watchlist alignment settings.
frontend/src/components/manga/MangaListP: Main page component that orchestrates manga list display with pagination, filtering, sorting, and connection status handling. Manages all filter state and renders filtered/sorted entries with offline mode support.
frontend/src/components/manga/MangaRowAc: Wraps a MangaCard with edit and delete action buttons, managing dialogs for editing manga entries and confirming deletions with backend mutation hooks.
frontend/src/components/manga/NotesPrevi: Renders a portal-based overlay that displays manga notes in a centered, styled popup when visible.
frontend/src/components/manga/Pagination: Provides pagination UI with previous/next buttons, numbered page buttons with ellipsis for large page counts, and a jump-to-page input field.
frontend/src/context/BackendConnectionCo: React context provider that creates a singleton backend connection instance using useBackendConnection hook, preventing multiple competing connection loops across the component tree.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook that creates and manages a backend actor instance using React Query, initializing it with Internet Identity and admin token, and invalidating dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useActorWithRetry.ts: Extended actor hook that delegates to useBackendConnectionSingleton to provide connection state tracking and retry functionality without creating multiple connection loops.
frontend/src/hooks/useAllMangaEntries.ts: Hook that fetches all manga entries from the backend with offline caching support using both IndexedDB (per-principal) and localStorage, falling back to cached data on network errors.
Core hook managing backend actor initialization and readiness with hard timeouts, bounded retry logic, session generation for race condition prevention, and comprehensive diagnostic tracking including automatic safeguard reset.
frontend/src/hooks/useBackendConnectionS: Simple hook that provides access to the singleton backend connection state from BackendConnectionContext, ensuring only one connection attempt loop is active.
frontend/src/hooks/useBackendReadiness.t: Hook that provides backend readiness state by delegating to the singleton connection hook and mapping connection status to readiness status.
frontend/src/hooks/useCachedCoverImageUr: Hook that returns a cover image URL, preferring cached blob from IndexedDB when available and falling back to network URL while asynchronously fetching and caching in the background.
frontend/src/hooks/useCurrentUserProfile: Hook providing query and mutation functions for fetching and saving the current user's profile, with proper backend readiness and authentication checks.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Context provider and hook for Internet Identity authentication, managing login state, identity persistence, and providing login/logout functions with configurable AuthClient options.
frontend/src/hooks/useLibraryGenres.ts: Hook that extracts and returns a sorted list of unique genres from all manga entries in the library.
frontend/src/hooks/useMangaMutations.ts: Collection of mutation hooks for manga operations (add, update, rating, bookmark, notes) using the singleton backend connection with query invalidation and error classification.
frontend/src/hooks/useMangaPage.ts: Hook for paginated manga data fetching (content truncated in provided file).
frontend/src/hooks/usePersistentPopupPos: Custom React hook that manages a draggable popup's position, persisting it to localStorage and clamping it within viewport bounds on resize or drag.
frontend/src/hooks/useUniformWatchlistRo: Custom React hook that measures and synchronizes row widths across watchlist items using ResizeObserver, ensuring uniform width based on the widest content.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom OKLCH color variables for dark theme and utility classes for rainbow glow, text, and border animations.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that sets up React Query and Internet Identity providers, then renders the root App component.
frontend/src/sw/registerServiceWorker.ts: Registers a service worker for offline functionality and provides a function to clear the service worker cache via postMessage.
frontend/src/utils/backendErrorClassific: Classifies backend errors into categories (connecting, transient, authorization, application, timeout) with user-friendly messages and retry logic, filtering out superseded/stale attempts.
frontend/src/utils/backendNotReadyMessag: Provides a unified error message and assertion function for checking if the backend connection is ready before operations.
frontend/src/utils/formatChapterNumber.t: Formats chapter numbers for display, showing integers without decimals and preserving decimal values when present.
frontend/src/utils/indexedDb.ts: Generic IndexedDB wrapper utilities providing open, get, put, delete, and getAllKeys operations for manga metadata and cover image stores.
frontend/src/utils/offlineCoverImageInde: IndexedDB cache layer for manga cover images, storing blobs keyed by principal, stableId, and URL hash with functions to fetch, store, and clear cached images.
frontend/src/utils/offlineMangaCache.ts: Legacy localStorage-based cache for manga entries with serialization/deserialization helpers for BigInt and complex types. Provides write, read, and clear functions with version checking.
frontend/src/utils/offlineMangaIndexedDb: IndexedDB-backed manga metadata cache with per-principal namespacing. Provides async write, read, and clear functions with version checking and serialization similar to the localStorage cache.
frontend/src/utils/promiseTimeout.ts: Promise timeout utilities including a TimeoutError class, withTimeout wrapper function, and createTimeout helper for enforcing hard time limits on async operations.
frontend/src/utils/retryBackoff.ts: Bounded exponential backoff retry logic with jitter, configurable max retries, delays, total time budget, per-operation timeouts, and a RetryManager class for manual retry control.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: URL parameter parsing utilities supporting both query strings and hash-based routing, with sessionStorage persistence helpers and functions to clear sensitive parameters from the URL.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom OKLCH color system, container settings, extended font families, border radius variables, custom shadows including gold-glow, and accordion animations.
project_state.json: Project state tracking four feature requests: vertical auto-scroll for overflowing manga titles with hover pause, rainbow gradient for Complete status, repositioned bookmark/notes icons, and hidden status chevron with repositioned chapter count display.
